alerts.error_initialization:
Error: 

There has occured an error while setting up the app database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_fonts:
Error: 

There has occured an error while loading fonts. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_saving:
Error: 

There has occured an error while trying to save data. Ensure you have enough free space on your device. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_achievements:
Error: 

There has occured an error while trying to update achievement progress. Ensure you have enough free space on your device. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_fetching:
Error: 

There has occured an error while loading saved data from the database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_processing:
Error: 

There has occured an error while processing the data loaded from the database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_db_erasing:
Error: 

There has occured an error while erasing saved data from the database. 

Try again later, and if the error persists contact support.
alerts.error_permissions:
Error: 

There has occured an error regarding the app's access to required permissions. Change your device settings and try again later.
alerts.entry_delete_success: Selected entry has been successfuly removed from your storage.
alerts.entry_delete_failure:
Error: 

there has been a problem deleting this entry. Try again later.
alerts.notification_failure:
Error: 

Could not set notification. Try again later.
alerts.notification_cancel: Daily notifications have been turned off.

instructions.tap_button_below: Tap the button below to proceed.

wrong_way.header_2: Sorry, there is currently nothing to see here.
wrong_way.body:
We're probably already on it and if you suspect we aren't, report a bug using the suitable button in settings menu. 

Thank you.
